title: Physician Badge Buddy - Heavy Duty Horizontal Badge Buddies for Physicians - Spill & Tear Proof Cards - 2 Sided USA Printed Quick Role Identifier ID Tag Backer by Specialist ID
features: HEAVY DUTY AND DURABLE - Heavy Duty, Water Proof, Spill Proof and Tear Resistant Laminated Teslin Badge Tags - Hospital and Physician Friendly
TOUGH ENOUGH FOR PHYSICIANS - PRINTED IN THE USA - Produced by an Amazing Team here in The US. Quality & Consistency are Guaranteed
PRINTED ON FRONT AND BACK - We've Printed the Red Border On Both Sides so Don't Worry if Your Name Badge Decides to Flip Around, You'll Still be Recognized for the Rock Star Physician You Are!

HANGS BELOW YOUR HORIZONTAL ID BADGES - Measures 3 3/8" Wide by 3 1/8" Tall - FIRM BUT FLEXIBLE AND SUPER TOUGH - These Have Similar Flex and Give to Standard Credit Cards but Will Not Snap, Stress or Break
BLANK & WRITABLE WHITE SURFACE - Allows You To Write Notes or Lab Values of Your Choice (Permanent or Dry Erase Markers Work Great, Just Make Sure You Check which You're Using First!)
description: We've been supplying the Nation's Hospitals and Medical Facilities with High Quality USA Printed Badge Buddies for nearly 10 years. These are great hospital identifiers designed to supplement your existing Hospital nametag and credentials. Badge buddies help patients and staff quickly identify new faces and team members, so everyone can quickly recognize who they are interacting with.

These USA printed badge buddies are amazing accessories for health care, office, school, and the retail environment. Clip them to your I.D. Holder and wear on your shirt pocket or scrubs to be for fast recognition so your employee or student status can be seen quickly by any patient, visitor or supervisor. These are a light weight identification sign that is worn behind photo id nametags or can hang directly to your badge holder lanyards without the need for an ID. We do have a custom Bulk 6 pack available if you need a custom option. Find it right here on Amazon! Easy design template and package delivery to your home or business. USA Assembled and Made by our customized product team here in Florida. We love being the maker, creator and keeping our design team in house so we can quickly produce the items and supplies you need for your busy med job. These make a great gift, cute light weight and simple without a bunch of extra stuff and text. We keep it simple, just the job names and some blank white space to add your sticker, buttons, or write and customize the text or lab values you want. Heck, or make your own cute design with a permanent marker. Whether you call these badge buddies, ID backers, badge backs. We make em great!

Our badge buddies can be found in many of the nation's largest hospitals because of their quality, consistency and appearance. Coffee spills and stressful environments won't even phase these badge buddies. Note these are not long enough to hang below a badge holder. We do offer special Badge Buddy badge clips that will help!

title: Badge Buddy ID Backer for Quick Role Recognition at Work
